query:
SELECT
            b.id,
            CASE WHEN b.file_type = 'fb2' THEN ARRAY['fb2', 'epub', 'mobi', 'fb2zip'] ELSE ARRAY[b.file_type] END AS "available_types!: Vec<String>"
        FROM books b
        JOIN book_authors ba ON b.id = ba.book
        WHERE
            b.is_deleted = false
            AND ba.author = $1
            AND b.lang = ANY($2)
